actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the reduction in income tax to take effect on July 1, 1983, under the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 should not be repealed or modified and the effective date of such reduction should not be postponed.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the reduction in income tax to take effect on July 1, 1983, as provided by the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981, should not be repealed or modified, and that the effective date of such reduction should not be postponed.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the reduction in income tax to take effect on July 1, 1983, under the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 should not be repealed or modified and the effective date of such reduction should not be postponed.
